name: Hotel Fatigue
description:
Controls1Sleep2Eat3Shower4EntertainmentDeveloper Note

I've been flying back and forth to London over the last three weeks for my work and staying in hotels is starting to take its toll. So I decided to make a game documenting the experience of needing to balance hunger, sleep, hygiene and entertainment.

The aim is simple; get all four needs about 90% and you get a treat. Full disclosure, I have played my own game and have only completed it once. It is very hard but doable. I did consider making it impossible to win as a sort of irony of needs management but I decided against it.

Good Luck!
